page.description: Sets the active row in the specified Repeating Section.

argument.name: instNumber
argument.description: The physical row number for the active row.

discussion.p: The *[js:setRepeatingSectionActiveRow()]* method sets the active row in a Repeating Section.

The *[js:instNumber]* is the physical row number. This is not necessarily the same as the logical row number if rows have been deleted from the Repeating Section. Use the [{dialog.object}.setRepeatingSectionActiveLogicalRow()] method to set the active row using the logical row number.

page.warning: If the repeating section contains deleted rows, the physical row number and logical row number will not match. Prefer to use the [{dialog.object}.setRepeatingSectionActiveLogicalRow()] method in this case.
